timeline.bodyText: This is wasteful because it will actually download the artifact
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Totally agreed. My understanding is that getting enabling a HEAD would require a cloud change, which we missed the boat on for beta2
replies.author: philcali

replies.bodyText: Michael, are you confident about that? I briefly looked the source code. It does open the input stream but I'm not sure if it reads the whole stream.
replies.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText: It will open the stream which will definitely start the download. Not sure if it would be interrupted after the first packet with headers.
replies.author: MikeDombo
